mapper.update: INSERT INTO T_PROD_M (BRAND_ID, SUB_BRAND_ID, PROD_ML_CD, USE_YN, DATA_REG_DTM, DATA_REG_ID, DATA_UPD_DTM, DATA_UPD_ID) VALUES (#{brandId}, #{subBrandId}, #{prodMlCd}, #{useYn}, #{regId}, '0', now(), #{regId})
mapper.select:
SELECT P.PROD_NO, P.BRAND_ID, B.BRAND_NM, SB.SUB_BRAND_ID, SB.SUB_BRAND_NM, (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00017' AND E.CMM_CD = P.PROD_ML_CD) AS PROD_ML_NM, P.PROD_ML_CD, (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00015' AND E.CMM_CD = SB.LIQ_KD_CD) AS LIQ_KD_NM, SB.LIQ_KD_CD, (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00014' AND E.CMM_CD = B.ORCO_BRAND_YN) AS ORCO_BRAND_NM, B.ORCO_BRAND_YN, P.USE_YN FROM T_PROD_M P, T_BRAND_M B, T_SUB_BRAND_M SB WHERE P.BRAND_ID = B.BRAND_ID AND P.SUB_BRAND_ID = SB.SUB_BRAND_ID AND B.BRAND_ID = SB.BRAND_ID AND B.BRAND_ID IN
#{var}

SELECT P.PROD_NO, P.BRAND_ID, B.BRAND_NM, SB.SUB_BRAND_ID, SB.SUB_BRAND_NM, P.PROD_ML_CD, SB.LIQ_KD_CD, B.ORCO_BRAND_YN, P.USE_YN FROM T_PROD_M P, T_BRAND_M B, T_SUB_BRAND_M SB WHERE P.BRAND_ID = B.BRAND_ID AND P.SUB_BRAND_ID = SB.SUB_BRAND_ID AND B.BRAND_ID = SB.BRAND_ID AND P.PROD_NO = #{prodNo} LIMIT 1

SELECT P.PROD_NO, P.BRAND_ID, M.BRAND_NM, P.SUB_BRAND_ID, S.SUB_BRAND_NM, (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00017' AND E.CMM_CD = P.PROD_ML_CD) AS PROD_ML_NM, P.PROD_ML_CD FROM T_PROD_M P , T_SUB_BRAND_M S, T_BRAND_M M WHERE 1=1 AND P.BRAND_ID = #{brandId} AND P.SUB_BRAND_ID = #{subBrandId} AND P.BRAND_ID = S.BRAND_ID AND P.SUB_BRAND_ID = S.SUB_BRAND_ID AND M.BRAND_ID = S.BRAND_ID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM T_VENDOR_MENU_D WHERE VENDOR_NO = #{vendorId} AND PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO)

SELECT V.VENDOR_NO, P.PROD_NO, P.BRAND_ID, M.BRAND_NM, P.SUB_BRAND_ID, S.SUB_BRAND_NM, P.USE_YN, M.ORCO_BRAND_YN, (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00014' AND E.CMM_CD = M.ORCO_BRAND_YN) AS ORCO_BRAND_NM, (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00017' AND E.CMM_CD = P.PROD_ML_CD) AS PROD_ML_NM, P.PROD_ML_CD, V.SALE_PRICE, V.SALE_STA_DT, V.SALE_END_DT FROM T_VENDOR_MENU_D V, T_PROD_M P, T_BRAND_M M, T_SUB_BRAND_M S, T_VENDOR_EMP_D D, T_EMP_M E WHERE 1=1 AND V.PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO AND P.BRAND_ID = M.BRAND_ID AND P.SUB_BRAND_ID = S.SUB_BRAND_ID AND M.BRAND_ID = S.BRAND_ID AND D.VENDOR_NO = V.VENDOR_NO AND E.EMP_NO = D.EMP_NO AND D.EFF_END_DT = '99991231' AND V.VENDOR_NO = #{vendorId} AND V.SALE_STA_DT >= #{staDt} AND V.SALE_END_DT <= #{endDt} AND E.DEPT_NO = #{deptNo} AND E.EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT V.VENDOR_NO, P.PROD_NO, P.BRAND_ID, M.BRAND_NM, P.SUB_BRAND_ID, S.SUB_BRAND_NM, P.USE_YN, M.ORCO_BRAND_YN, (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00014' AND E.CMM_CD = M.ORCO_BRAND_YN) AS ORCO_BRAND_NM, (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00017' AND E.CMM_CD = P.PROD_ML_CD) AS PROD_ML_NM, P.PROD_ML_CD, V.SALE_PRICE, V.SALE_STA_DT, V.SALE_END_DT FROM T_VENDOR_MENU_D V, T_PROD_M P, T_BRAND_M M, T_SUB_BRAND_M S WHERE 1=1 AND V.PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO AND P.BRAND_ID = M.BRAND_ID AND P.SUB_BRAND_ID = S.SUB_BRAND_ID AND M.BRAND_ID = S.BRAND_ID AND V.VENDOR_NO = #{vendorNo} AND V.PROD_NO = #{prodNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_VENDOR_MENU_D SET SALE_PRICE = #{salePrice} , SALE_STA_DT = #{saleStaDt} , SALE_END_DT = #{saleEndDt} , DATA_UPD_ID = #{regId}, DATA_UPD_DTM = now() WHERE VENDOR_NO = #{vendorNo} AND PROD_NO = #{prodNo}
mapper.select: SELECT P.BRAND_ID, M.BRAND_NM FROM T_PROD_M P , T_SUB_BRAND_M S, T_BRAND_M M WHERE 1=1 AND P.BRAND_ID = S.BRAND_ID AND P.SUB_BRAND_ID = S.SUB_BRAND_ID AND M.BRAND_ID = S.BRAND_ID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM T_VENDOR_MENU_D WHERE VENDOR_NO = #{vendorId} AND PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO) GROUP BY P.BRAND_ID ,M.BRAND_NM

SELECT P.SUB_BRAND_ID, S.SUB_BRAND_NM FROM T_PROD_M P , T_SUB_BRAND_M S, T_BRAND_M M WHERE 1=1 AND P.BRAND_ID = S.BRAND_ID AND P.SUB_BRAND_ID = S.SUB_BRAND_ID AND M.BRAND_ID = S.BRAND_ID AND P.BRAND_ID = #{brandId} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM T_VENDOR_MENU_D WHERE VENDOR_NO = #{vendorId} AND PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO) GROUP BY P.SUB_BRAND_ID, S.SUB_BRAND_NM
